name: Race Track Generator
description:
This is a procedural generation use case not a full game. You can view the Unity scripts on GitHub.

------------------------------------------------------

Controls

Generating Tracks: Use the buttons on the main screen to make a new track, switch between track and car view and to reset the car position. Use the sliders on the settings menu to tweak the generation and select the desired road model.

Driving: Use the arrow keys or triggers & left joystick to move the car. Mouse or right joystick to pan around (in the car view). Press spacebar or the B button for Xbox (equivalent button on other controllers) to toggle the handbrake, the handbrake will automatically release when you drive.

Press Esc or the start button to quit the application.

------------------------------------------------------

All assets created by me excluding:

  • Car - POLYGON City
  • Grass texture - Grass0202
  • Skybox - Skybox Series Free
  • Cursor - Mouse Cursor Vectors
  • Font - Suez One
